languages.text: "О чем я уже изрядно жалею. Дюжину раз шел на смерть наш брат Ульфар, и лишь покровительство Всеотца охранило его от жестокой смерти". {n}Вожак стаи Грозовых укусов одобрительно ухмыляется.{/n}

"And I've regretted it ever since. Brother Ulfar has already marched toward his death a dozen times, and only the Allfather's eye kept him from meeting a gruesome end." {n}Thorbald grins in approval.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О чем я уже изрядно жалею. Дюжину раз шел на смерть наш брат Ульфар, и лишь покровительство Всеотца охранило его от жестокой смерти". {n}Вожак стаи Грозовых укусов одобрительно ухмыляется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And I've regretted it since. Brother Ulfar has already marched toward his death a dozen times, and only the Allfather's eye kept him from meeting a gruesome end." {n}Thorbald grins in approval.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

traits.locale_text: "And I've regretted it ever since. Brother Ulfar has already marched toward his death a dozen times, and only the Allfather's eye kept him from meeting a gruesome end." {n}Thorbald grins in approval.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: “从他上船的那一刻开始，我就一直在后悔。乌尔法已经十几次大步迈向死亡，多亏全父的庇佑，他才没有战死沙场。”{n}索巴德咧嘴笑了起来，笑容中满是赞许之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I've regretted it ever since. Brother Ulfar has already marched toward his death a dozen times, and only the Allfather's eye kept him from meeting a gruesome end." {n}Thorbald grins in approval.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “让他上传之后，我就后悔了。乌尔法已经十几次大步迈向死亡，多亏全父的庇佑，他才没有战死沙场。”{n}索巴德咧嘴笑了起来，笑容中满是赞许之意。{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: « Et je regrette ma décision. Frère Ulfar a déjà frôlé la mort une bonne dizaine de fois, et il ne doit sa survie qu'à l'œil bienveillant du Père de Tous. » {n}Thorbald acquiesce d'un grand sourire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I've regretted it ever since. Brother Ulfar has already marched toward his death a dozen times, and only the Allfather's eye kept him from meeting a gruesome end." {n}Thorbald grins in approval.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et je regrette ma décision. Frère Ulfar a déjà frôlé la mort une bonne dizaine de fois, et il ne doit sa survie qu'à l'œil bienveillant du Père de Tous. » {n}Thorbald acquiesce d'un grand sourire.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: 「ずっと後悔しているがな。同胞ウルファーは何度も死に際を見てきた。こいつが生きているのは全知の父が見守ってくれているからだ」{n}トールバルドは満足そうににやりと笑った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I've regretted it ever since. Brother Ulfar has already marched toward his death a dozen times, and only the Allfather's eye kept him from meeting a gruesome end." {n}Thorbald grins in approval.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ずっと後悔しているがな。同胞ウルファーは何度も死に際を見てきた。こいつが生きているのは全知の父が見守ってくれているからだ」{n}トールバルドは満足そうににやりと笑った。{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: «Y no he hecho más que lamentarlo desde entonces. El hermano Ulfar ha cargado directo a la muerte y, de no ser por el Padre de todas las cosas, ya la habría encontrado una docena de veces». {n}Thorbald sonríe con aprobación.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I've regretted it ever since. Brother Ulfar has already marched toward his death a dozen times, and only the Allfather's eye kept him from meeting a gruesome end." {n}Thorbald grins in approval.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y no he hecho más que lamentarlo desde entonces. El hermano Ulfar ha cargado directo a la muerte y, de no ser por el Padre de todas las cosas, ya la habría encontrado una docena de veces». {n}Thorbald sonríe con aprobación.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Und ich bereue es seitdem. Bruder Ulfar ist schon ein Dutzend Mal auf seinen Tod zumarschiert, und nur das Auge des Allvaters hat verhindert, dass er ein grauenhaftes Ende findet." {n}Thorbald grinst wohlwollend.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I've regretted it ever since. Brother Ulfar has already marched toward his death a dozen times, and only the Allfather's eye kept him from meeting a gruesome end." {n}Thorbald grins in approval.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und ich bereue es seitdem. Bruder Ulfar ist schon ein Dutzend Mal auf seinen Tod zumarschiert, und nur das Auge des Allvaters hat verhindert, dass er ein grauenhaftes Ende findet." {n}Thorbald grinst wohlwollend.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Bahşettiğime edeceğime pişman oldum. Kardeş Ulfar, defalarca ölümüne koştu. Yücebaba'nın gözü ise onu kanlı sonuna ulaşmaktan alıkoydu." {n}Thorbald, onaylarcasına sırıtıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I've regretted it ever since. Brother Ulfar has already marched toward his death a dozen times, and only the Allfather's eye kept him from meeting a gruesome end." {n}Thorbald grins in approval.{/n}
